scripts.build:wasm: cd crates/wasm_example && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../apps/web/src/wasm/wasm_example && cd ../wasm_points && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../apps/web/src/wasm/wasm_points && cd ../wasm_obj_loader && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../apps/web/src/wasm/wasm_obj_loader && cd ../wasm_webgpu_demo && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../apps/web/src/wasm/wasm_webgpu_demo && cd ../wasm_voxelizer && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../apps/web/src/wasm/wasm_voxelizer
